verificationTokenDialog.title: Didn’t receive the code
verificationTokenDialog.noReceiveCode: If you didn't receive the code, the reasons might be:
verificationTokenDialog.contentLine2: 2. The received email has been treated as junk email.
verificationTokenDialog.contentLine3: 3. Either the email address or the password you entered is incorrect.
